You can do whatever you want with him. You can even make this adolescent cry. His tears are just as valuable as the rest of his kin. The highest bidder gets to have him. The starting price for this lad is 2000 gold."

You then start sweating as the house of rogues, pirates, assassins, and other scum start making offers to buy you. The whole world seemed to stand still when...
15213112.title: Loaded off the ship and to the Guild

choices: Began to rain
A female thief tries to mug you
152131121.content:
The whole world seemed to stand still when two guards dressed in royal attire spoke up.

"We'll take him for 35,000 gold."

"Sold to the King's men!"

You are then shoved towards the King's men. The King's men were dressed in silver and red clothing and were wearing steel helmets.

"Let me go!"

The royal guard with a dark tan grabs you by the hand.

"This is for your own good."

Once outside and out of sight from any passerby the guards place you in an empty barrel.

"Listen lad, we're here on orders from our princess. A week or so ago she stopped by here and was disgusted by the corruption here. That very guild that we saved you from is the pinnacle of this town's corruption. We had to stop our princess from burning the Guild down. After watching all this go down within a week we'll have to shut that Adventurer's Guild Down permanently."

"So you're not going to torture me?"

"That's right boy. But before we can go anywhere we need to get you some clothes. We can't let you go walking around naked." The other royal guard replied.

"Clothes? What are clothes?"

"Let me guess you never been to the surface before."

"Yeah, one of the royal guards from Pearl Clam told me that they spotted what your race calls a ship. I was checking up on a friend of mine. Her name is Erin. I saw her washed ashore when we docked an hour ago."

"I see. So that explains why we saw a naked girl walking around town. First let's get you some threads then we'll help you look. Naphtali, stay here with the merman. I'll go buy some clothes for him." The man with the dark tan said.

"Will do Gareth."

Gareth then walks away in search of a vendor.

"What's your name kid?" Naphtali asked.

"My friends call me Percy. It's more of a nickname rather than my full name."

"I see. Judging by what you told us earlier you're a noble."

"I'm actually a prince. My mother is queen of the merpeople."

"Then we have to return you to the sea asap. With all this going on we may have a war on our hands if we don't do anything to free your kin."

A sense of dread covers your face. Your mother isn't know for her patience. In fact she may be preparing the royal army for war as you sit here.

"I'm not going anywhere until we save my friend and rescue my fellow merpeople."

"Are you sure Percy?"

"I'm certain. I will not swim home free until we do this."

"Then we will help."

"Thanks Naphtali."

Thirty minutes later Gareth returns with some clothes.

"Put these on. They should be roughly your size."

Gareth tosses the clothes into the barrel that you were sitting in. Then both guards turn around while you get dressed. It didn't take long to get changed. The clothes you were given were a brown, but now you didn't have to worry about your groin being exposed.

"Now let's look for your friend."

You and your saviors look all over town for Erin. Unfortunately you couldn't find her and...
152131121.title: Unexpected Saviors and a Resolution

choices: You run into Erin and a gorgeous human woman and an older warrior
You run into the Black Swan herself!
1521311211.content:
Unfortunately you couldn't find her and it began to rain. The rain started with one drop that fell on your head. Fairly soon the rain started to come down hard and heavy. Consequently your feet were turning back into a tail. That also meant that your new brown pants were tearing to shreds.

"We have to get him out of the rain!" Gareth yelled to Naphtali.

"You don't have to tell me twice! We'll never be able to find his friend like this!" Naphtali replied.

As much as you hate to admit it they were right. Like this you could barely move on land and when your tail dried and turned back into legs your groin would be exposed again and you don't need to be told how embarrassing that would be. You were already kidnapped by pirates a day ago. You can't even get the horrible torture that they made you endure. Your now start to believe that this weather could be a sign that your mother is preparing the royal army. As you were being carried in Naphtali's big muscular arms you noticed that the seas were awfully rough.

This could be one of two things. One the sea warlock is has gotten his tentacles into some evil or mother is really ticked off and has declared war on the surface world. I have a feeling that by mid-tide tomorrow that she'll have those who have been on land to attack from land while the rest of the army would destroy the docks and ships.

You then notice the pirates carrying their merpeople prisoners out of the ship and into the Thieves' Guild. It didn't take too long for their ship to be swallowed by the waves. You then notice what appears to be Captain Crossblade cursing at the sea while standing at the doorway to the guild. Fortunately 20 merpeople were saved from more abuse, however many of them were now relocated to the guild.

Mother is so going to destroy this place. There are a few nice humans here, but knowing mother she'll want them all dead. Especially since I was kidnapped. If I can find Erin and warn her of the coming war, then we may be able to negotiate with my mother. Unfortunately mermaids have more say than mermen, even if they are royalty. That's also counting that the male to female ratio is almost even.

After twenty minutes of running through blinding rain the royal human guards reach the inn and head to their room. Your tail is immediately dried off and a sheet is thrown over your body as they transform back into feet.

"Stay there. Once this accursed rain stops I'll fetch a few more pairs of clothes for you. Usually there's no rain before the Golden Sword Tournament. Some people believe that if it rains before the Golden Sword Tournament bad things are bound to happen." Naphtali said as he stripped off his wet clothes and put on dry clothes.

It isn't until two hours later that the rain stops. It didn't take long for Naphtali to purchase you two pairs of new clothes and an extra pair of pants. You immediately slip on the pants. Afterwards your comrades take you to the inn's tavern. Once there you spot the same man and women who were in front of the Thieves' Guild this morning.

"I'm impressed Charlotte. You seemed to have outdone yourself deary. Not only did you get that mermaid's tears but you also robbed the Lion Warrior and his father. I have never pulled off such a feat like that. Most people I can rob, but you are truly gifted." The man said to the woman.

"I had tons of practice while trying to come here. I even stole this box from a sleeping dragon. It could've gone smoother if my old cloak didn't tear. Unfortunately they two day diversion I had to elude the dragon. The bad thing is I think he's still looking for me."

"You can only evade a dragon for so long. Those blowhards can even take on a human form." The man replied.

"I know. There was a man that I briefly passed by wearing armor that was similar to the dragon's scales when I was in the town in the mountains. Fortunately I had replaced my cloak at the time and the streets were full of people. Yet one glance at his eyes and it was easy to tell that he was a dragon. Yet he seemed to be concerned with a few other things as well and didn't look concerned."

"That's because it's close to mating season and hibernation, but you should never look a dragon directly in the eyes. They can easily read your mind."

"I thought that was a myth, Mathis."

"It's not, but enough of that Charlotte. I think we may have to run."

The two thieves realize that you and the guards with you were eavesdropping on their entire conversation. You and the guards approach the thieves.

"Lady Charlotte Everbloom? What are you doing with scum like him?" Gareth asked the thief.

"You really don't know do you. My parents were murdered by thieves and I had no choice but to become one myself! Those thieves stole everything from me! I'm only doing this for revenge on those parasites!"

You notice the man named Mathis turn pale as a ghost. Apparently he has a secret concerning this woman's parents. It doesn't take long for the woman to figure out that the man played a part.

"You were using me! We're supposed to be working together. Forget it. Explain it later. We gotta run."

"Not so fast. You two are wanted for multiple acts of theft. If you resist us then by royal decree by the king and queen we will have no choice but to give pursuit." Gareth said.

The thieves make a quick getaway, but not without dropping a few of their stolen money sacks, a necklace, and the box. You were about to give chase when you notice that it is raining. By then they are long gone.

"Drat! They escaped!" Naphtali yelled.

"I can't believe that Lady Everbloom would turn to a life of crime. I feel sorry for her, but that does not excuse her actions!"

You then pick up the ornate box and open it. To your surprise it was empty.

"Whatever was in the box is gone. I'm certain that no one would keep an empty box on their person."

Gareth quickly looks at the box.

"You're right Percy. It looks like it was supposed to have a magic bean inside that leads to the land of the giants."

"Land of the what now? Don't we have to apprehend those thieves?"

"Normally yes, but not tonight. It started to rain again. Let's just enjoy our meal." Naphtali said as he pulled out his own coin pouch.

"Gareth, we'll have to find Reymond Lionshield and give him this stuff. I'm pretty sure he and whoever owns this necklace will be looking for it."

"Agreed."

While you were enjoying dinner the two thieves were by the Thieve's Guild.

"Do I have to wear this stupid outfit. I look like a prostitute."

"But it looks so lovely on you my dear Charlotte."

"Whatever Mathis, but you owe me. Luckily I held onto this bean. After not selling it I may as well rob the land of the giants next."

"Mind if I come along. I've actually been to Gimunga before with my sister Gilda."

"As long as I get a 90% of everything we steal."

"No deal deary. I have what I came for and it is time that we part."

"No way mister. Are you really that much of a pervert to even thinking of touching my boobs."

"Actually That's not what I was sent to do, but we'll talk later."

The next day.
1521311211.title: When it Rains it Pours and Thieves in a Tavern

choices: Bartus believes that your rescuers are capable
Bartus doesn't know Gareth and Naphtali well enough
15213112111.content:
The next day after eating some breakfast you and the guards, Gareth and Naphtali set out to find your friend Erin.

"Looks like these items aren't the only thing we'll have to give Reymond Lionshield. The king and Princess Loraine sent a letter via pigeon. It's unfortunate that the queen is sick." Gareth said.

"I know, and it all happened while the princess was in Gimunga dealing with traitors to the kingdom too. A week ago we were sent here to put an end to the corruption of this town under the princess's orders and now this."

As you were walking you see Erin with a woman dressed in a green robe and a warrior in his mid 40s. Once Erin sees you she comes running towards you. Gareth and Naphtali unsheathe their weapons thinking that Erin was going to attack you. " Prince! I can't believe it's you!" Erin said. Gareth and Naphtali look at each other and then quickly realize that this girl must be someone that you know. " You two know each other?" Gareth asked.

" Yes, we do this is Erin, I've been searching for her for quite awhile." You replied that reminding them that you mentioned Erin by name yesterday and that two days ago, including the time on the pirate ship that you been searching for her. " Weren't you captured Erin? What happened to you?"

" Well I was helped out a bit and managed to escape, then I met some friends who helped me and taught me a bit about the surface, then I got attacked again after I tried hitting rocks." Erin said eagerly trying to explain as much as possible in a relatively short amount of time.

The news that Erin gave you was relieving. You thought that the pirates would of taken her to the ship as they dragged to the Thieve's Guild. You were about to tell Erin your story when the woman in the green robe spoke up.

"I think you two could play catch up later, right now we got people to rescue."

You immediately realize that the woman is referring to the merpeople still in the Thieve's Guild. You then notice that Gareth and Naphtali recognize the older man.

"I think I recognized that man! He's Bartus Lionshield! The woman however I don't know...We got a message for your son from the King and princess." Naphtali said.

"He's competing in the tournament right now, so he'll be able to get it later." Bartus replied.

You begin to wonder if Naphtali forgot to mention the stolen goods that you found last night after the thieves in the tavern took off. You then notice that the woman had something else to ask.

" Bartus, do you think these two guards will be able to help us?" The woman asked.
15213112111.title: Reunited at Last

choices: Come across Captain Crossblade and his crew.
Discover that all the mermaids and mermen were relocated
152131121112.content:
"I don't know them well enough. The last time I was at the castle was fifteen years ago."

"Then how can we be sure that they'll help us?"

You look at your rescuers hoping that they'll respond to the woman's concerns.

"Bartus, last night when we were in the tavern we came across two thieves. One was the infamous Gentleman Thief Mathis and the other was Charlotte Everbloom. We tried to apprehend them last night, but they got away. Fortunately we were able to recover the things they stole," Gareth said as he pulled out the necklace, ornate box, and three sacks of gold. "We believe one of these sacks of gold belongs to you and your son. Do you know whose necklace and sack of gold this is? We don't know the woman who he conned it off of."

Gareth hands Bartus the sacks of gold.

"That necklace and sack of gold belongs to a young woman named Alyssa."

"Do you know where we can find her?" Naphtali asked.

"She's competing in the Golden Sword Tournament." Bartus replied.

"Interesting, two years ago the princess competed and won the tournament. Last year she competed in the Volvasa Battle Tournament."

"You mean little Loraine? The last time I saw her she was having tea parties and picking flowers."

"Excuse me, but what about that box?" The woman in green interjected.

"We heard Charlotte claim that she stole it from a dragon. We checked to see if there was something inside, but she must have taken the contents out. We believe that she may have this so called bean on her person." You replied.

You notice the woman look at the box with curiosity. She remained calm and determined.

"We're just going to have to track down this Charlotte Everbloom." The woman replied.

"Before we ask you guys for help what are your names. Just because someone gives back your stolen goods doesn't mean they're trustworthy."

"Very well, I am Gareth Kamenswartz."

"And I am Naphtali Noir."

You see the man named Bartus recognizes the last names of your rescuers.

"You were those boys who used to play with the princess. You two have grown into fine men. So which one of you commands the king's army?"

"Neither of us do. You wouldn't believe this if we told, but..." Naphtali is cut off by the woman in the green robe.

"We don't have time for casual conversation. We need to expose the corruption in this town."

You realize that the woman has a point. "She's right. We don't have time for this. Erin, stay close to me. If it gets too dangerous head back to Pearl Clam."

"But Percy! Do you even know how to fight on land?"

"That doesn't matter. I spared against Reef using swordfish before."

"But, you a kid like I am."

"Not now Erin. I'm sixteen. I'm pretty sure that makes me a man by now. I even had to suffer in that terrible Exotic Room."

"Ok, but I wanna help too."

You sigh at Erin. She's only a month away from turning fifteen and still she's as persistent as ever.

"Let's go!"

You and your allies travel to the Thieve's Guild. Once there you
152131121112.title: Uncertain about Gareth and Naphtali

choices: You Run into the First Mate!
You Safely reach your kin!
1521311211121.content:
Once there you come across Captain Crossblade and his crew. The only reason you were able to recognize them however was because they were the one's who captured you in the first place. This still didn't change much of your plans with rescuing your kin. Of course you were more eager for blood for this crew as you knew how cruel these pirate's can be.

" Looks like we got some pirates on guard here." Gareth said.

" Still doesn't change what we have to do? So are we going to rush them or what?" Naphtali asked.

" No, we don't rush and these pirates don't look too smart to me, so I'll handle this with a little bit of magic." Esmeralda replied to the two Royal Guards. After saying that she began to silently as possible cast a sleep spell that would put all the pirates guarding the door asleep. Once the incantation was finished she threw the energy of the spell towards the area of the pirates and by some form of luck they all fell asleep.

'" That's one fight we don't have to fight now, just make sure not to wake them when you take the key's from them." Esmeralda told the group. Bartus, Naphtali, and Gareth then all went and carefully searched the sleeping pirates for the keys. Fortunately Gareth managed to find them on one of the guards sleeping at the entrance. Once inside you only thought of getting your vengeance but so far Esmeralda had taken the lead you could tell that Bartus was quietly judging her from the way he looked at her. Even you were judging her a bit, still you decided to test her a bit and pretend to be blinded by your own rage.

" Once the mermaids and mermen are safe will begin attacking, it will be Erin and Percy's job to make sure they get out of here safely." Esmeralda said.

" You mean I will be helping as well, but why not fight with you?" Erin asked.

" I agree with Erin we should be just attacking right now not all this stuff." You responded testing Esmeralda's wisdom to see how much she has really thought through.

" If we fight now Erin they could use the other Mermaids and Mermen as a hostage and hinder are progress at stopping this operation as a whole! Also I doubt your people would trust us that much after being held captive by these others. Otherwise you would be with Alyssa at the tournament. " Esmeralda explained to them You and Erin both nodded and had seem to understand Esmeralda's reasoning. The mermen and Mermaids were first priority taking down the guild and gathering up all the contraband was second. At least that's what it was to the human's your Second priority after your people were safe is to have Erin calm your mother down. This was especially important as you didn't want her to drown a whole bunch of innocent humans.
1521311211121.title: A Crew without their Captain

choices: Your Sister
A Drowning Child
15213112111211.content:
You manage to run into the first mate of Captain Killian's crew. This wasn't bad luck more or less he expected you to be there. For awhile it looked like all your efforts and attempts to free your kin would fail. Fortunately that wasn't the case.

" Your not going to free the prisoners that easily!" The First mate said confident that he could take you all on. Including Esmeralda despite her magical prowess.

" I think you are forgetting something, that we happen to have the greatest hero of all on our side the Legendary Lion Warrior!" Esmeralda exclaimed to the first mate.

" She's right so I think I ought to play the part correctly! You guys go on ahead with me I'll keep this guy busy so you can free them!" Bartus told the rest of you. It was then you had a fortunate chance to escape and free the mermaids. Although you would like to battle this guy you knew very well that wasn't your top priority right now.

Bartus interference allowed you to find the rest of the mermaids which kind shocked Erin, it was her first time seeing such a scene and if It were up to you she would never have to see a scene like this again. " Don't turn your head away from this Erin, remember this so you can always be aware of what malicious people are capable of." you told Erin.

Erin agreed and didn't turn her back from the horrors that she saw. " I'd never imagine it would be like this, but still we have to save them." She said.

" But how will we free them? We can't just keep fighting the thieves all night?" Gareth asked. This you had no idea of how the mermaids would be free. Fortunately however Erin had an idea. " I have an idea but it requires us to use magic and maybe Esmeralda can help too." Erin said.

She then explained there idea Erin remembered when she was young she took a peak at the surface on a continent that was filled with ice and saw many creatures moving on the bellies and into the water. She even thought if she ever had legs she would try it once. It was then that it came to her that this idea could be used as a way for the mermaids to escape. Esmeralda liked the idea as well but the idea required them to find a place they can use to lead them straight to the ocean.

Esmeralda quickly found one and now it was time to get the prisoners out as fast as possible. You, Erin and Esmeralda cast your magic and prepared this ice bridge and made it all the way to the ocean! It was amazing you were able to do such a feat, but now the next part had come. The Mermaids were free and now you had to go to meet with your mother.

" Goodbye, Friends hopefully we can put an end to all this." You tell them. You wave goodbye and Erin says her goodbyes as well before leaving with you on the slide. It wasn't long when you both went back into the ocean along with several missing mermaids. Unfortunately you couldn't account for the ones that we're dead, but at least you managed to save the majority of them.

As you and Erin swim in hopes of finding your mother and convincing her to stop her attack, you run into....
15213112111211.title: The First Mate's Attack!

choices: Caught in a Fishing Net
Trapped Under an Old Ship
Being Chased by a hungry Shark!
153.content:
Your name is Erin you are well known amongst your people for being one of the most unluckiest mermaids to ever set foot in the sea. You have constantly been trapped and on numerous occasions your mermaids friends have often helped get you out of some rather sticky situations. Despite this bad luck you are often very curious about almost anything you learn. From the things that fall below from the surface, and even to the reasons why mermaids isolate themselves from the rest of the world.

One day as you were swimming idly you noticed something that rather sparked your interest. Not sure what to make of it you decided to investigate it. The only problem was that it was in an area where a lot of human ships had come in. You had to investigate it though, cause it was strange seeing this type of structure underwater. It looked like there were many rooms and one building going up and up further and further. However as far as you can see there seem to be no entry way but plenty of holes for smaller fish to go through in and out with ease, and yet no fish came near this strange building. Unfortunately just as you were investigating the tower your luck once again strikes as you found yourself...
153.title: Erin the Unlucky Mermaid

choices: The Main Continent
An Island
Another transport
1531.content:
you found yourself caught in a fishing net. You struggled to get out as best as you could but to no avail, the more you struggled the deeper you got in the net and eventually you were lifted out of the water. You look and saw that the ship had a black flag with a skull and crossbones in front of it. You were curious about what that was about, but unfortunately you fainted from exhaustion. The last thing you heard was a man saying..

" Good job boys! This one will make a mighty profit. Now let's see if the rumors are true." The man said. You didn't know who he was or what he was going to see with you but you felt as though your body had become dry.

You woke up to a big surprise when you found yourself with legs. You heard tales of mermaids having legs when they were completely dry, but this was the first time you saw it. As you looked around you saw that you weren't the only prisoner here.

" They got you too?" Another woman asked.

" It appears so but what happened to my tail?" You asked.

" Don't worry it will come back once a bit of water hits you, but as of right now let me teach you how to walk." The woman replied. You simply nodded and the woman had taught you a bit about how to walk at first it was painful, but you eventually got the hang of it. Enough of it to where you could run. As you looked you saw that the people in the ship were taking you to...
1531.title: Captured Mermaid!
